original_text:
I will sing to the Lord as long as I live;
    I will sing praise to my God while I have being.
korean_text: 내가 평생토록 여호와께 노래하며 내가 살아 있는 동안 내 하나님을 찬양하리로다

sentences.original_text: I will sing to the Lord as long as I live
I will sing praise to my God while I have being.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 있는 동안 나의 하나님을 찬양하겠습니다
